name: Puci Virtual Pet
description:
Is a simplistic virtual pet game. By it's concept it means some clicking, some buying and letting the pet sleep. But be warned, leave it alone for too long and it'll die.

Features:

  1. Easy to use UI
  2. Not so Fancy design of the Puci
  3. Nameable puci
  4. The Puci has a house
  5. Vaccination?

Visit our Website here

This game is made to be updated. So keep on it.
